title: rasengan
author: rasengan
content: Joseon, the world's first legally recognized cyber nation-state, provides the ability for Denizens in its jurisdiction to create a legal juridic person (register a company). In Joseon, crypto [1] is treated as a first-class citizen and, generally, laws are non-burdensome creating a permissive ecosystem for frontline, innovative technological projects.Joseon is legally recognized by Antigua, a UN member nation, and there are several more nations who will be recognizing Joseon soon [2].BKEX [3] and LBank [4] have already announced branches in Joseon, and there are several more companies who will likely be announcing soon.How to Register1. Signup on Joseon.com as a Denizen2. Purchase JSM (Joseon Mun) to register your business on Joseon.com's Portal3. Conduct business, with other Denizens, under Joseon law, which is the most 'freedom' providing jurisdiction in the world.Learn more:https://joseon.com/https://joseon.cloud/JoseonWhitepaper.pdf[1] Cryptography, generally, including e2e encryption, cryptocurrency, blockchain, etc.[2] https://joseon.cloud/images/joseon-antigua-treaty-signing.jpeg[3] https://www.marketwatch.com/press-release/bkex-plans-to-incorporate-in-joseon-and-list-the-national-currency-joseon-mun-jsm-2023-05-09[4] https://alexablockchain.com/lbank-to-open-branch-in-cyber-nation-state-of-joseon/
